abstract: Salinas, a new Spanish restaurant in Chelsea, is reviewed by Eric Asimov this week.
snippet: Salinas, a new Spanish restaurant in Chelsea, is reviewed by Eric Asimov this week.
lead_paragraph: Yes, I've got myself some temp work here as the process of selecting the next restaurant critic unfolds. This week, I'm reviewing Salinas, one of a series of good Spanish restaurants to have opened in recent years.
